thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Why The Fun Is Already Fading for Investment Banks

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Why The Fun Is Already Fading for Investment Banks
text:
Swiss bank UBS may have set the tone for European banksâ€™ first quarters: a victory with little cause for celebration.
The investment bank and wealth manager for the superrich rode a strong rebound in equities trading and advisory work. That helped it beat expectations for first-quarter profits, which rose 19% against the same period last year. So far, so good.
But...
